name: Echo Lake
description: Enter the moonlit world of Echo Lake: a single-player adventure game currently in development via Steam (PC) Early Access. v2.0 includes Astronaut mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 3570k @ 3.4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 460 GTX DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1200 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio Additional Notes: Requirements based on alpha 2.0 demo
